wikitext.*:
'''''hosta''''' is a [[Quenya]] word with two different meanings depending if used as a noun or a verb.
==hosta<sup>1</sup>==
Noun “large number”<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}</ref>
==hosta-<sup>2</sup>==
Verb "gather, collect, assemble"<ref>{{MC|6}}, p. 223</ref><ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 39</ref>
==Example==
* [[Tar-Hostamir#Etymology|''Tar-'''Hosta'''mir'']] = can be interpreted as "Many Jewels" or "Collector of Jewels".<ref>{{webcite|author=Paul Strack|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-3407738053.html|articlename=Q. ''Hostamir'' m.|website=[http://eldamo.org/index.html Eldamo - An Elvish Lexicon]|accessed=4 May 2019}}</ref>
{{references}}
{{title|lowercase}}
